title: Client is fine, cannot connect to game server (cannot get to loading screen)
body:
Hello, I have run into this problem several times now today. I get through champ select and everything fine but as soon as I leave client and go to the game (loading screen) I cannot connect. The error message blames my firewall but I have not only made sure LoL has exception but I have also flat out disabled my firewall and anything else on my comp that could possibly interfere with a connection and still do not get a connection through. The most frustrating part of this is it doesn't happen to every game, just what seems like every other game now.

I'm assuming this has something to do with the network/ISP fiddling that is happening on NA servers and that's completely understandable, but could I possibly get an ETA on when I can go back to a reliable connection? And hoping beyond hope if there's a way I can fix this on my end?

replies.body:
Hey Sir ArmaMalum,

Getting through Champion Selection, only not to be able to connect to the actual Game and Loading screen is a pretty awful experience.  There are quite a number of reasons as to why you cannot connect through the Loading Screen normally.  Typically, these issues are caused by a 3rd party security software (such as a Firewall) that is actively blocking your connection to our Game Servers.  While I know you mentioned you directly disabled your Firewalls, make sure that you try all of the steps found in this Knowledge Base Article:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22114820-Firewall-Configuration-for-League-of-Legends

If your issue still persists, we will need several logs in order to determine why this issue is occurring in order to continue troubleshooting.  To that end, I will need you to create a new Support Ticket (found here:  https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new) and provide the following logs:

1) Network Analysis: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20103436-obtaining-a-network-analysis

2) NetworkInfo Log: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132863-obtaining-a-networkinfo-log

3) Process List: http://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/20132988-obtaining-a-process-list

4) Please send your most recent r3d log where you experienced the problem (You'll notice that the file name starts with the date/time and ends with r3dlog.txt): https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/22128450-League-of-Legends-Logs
I just made a thread about the same issue, but I just recently used the search box (my bad....). Anyways, the first 2 links don't work and I really need help.

I'm having the same problem and I have 100% checked that League is allowed through firewalls. Is it at all possible that there is a problem on your end like ddos attacks or other non-reported server issues. I'm not a troll trying to call you out or rage at rito, I just want to know if there is any other option since I've tried all apparently available to me.

Cool! Thank you very much! I will get right on this and see if it's all resolved. Fingers crossed!

I vastly appreciate the help, thank you again.

Go to  MyPC (or "This PC" whatever runs on your pc) use this address { C:\Riot Games\League of Legends } click on lol.launcher.admin.exe (if this isn't there, make sure lol.launcher.exe is being run as admin by Right clicking and clicking on properties) lol.launcher.edmin.exe should be in your folder and when you open league through this it bypasses whatever is stopping you.

It worked for me and I literally tried everything else.
Simply replace your normal LoL shortcut with lol.launcher.admin.exe
use that and you should be good to go.

I'm having the same problem and i still haven't found a solution. the first link doesn't work btw. And with my game it doesn't allow me to load with everyone else. it pops up firewall error and i wait until everyone is in game before i am able to load in. Sometimes it will allow me to load but the game is half way in and now i have low priority queue for 20min which is incredibly annoying and unfair.

I got the same error. I've played several games in a row then suddenly this error. I'm LIVID, I got a warning for leaving a game that the client would NOT let me connect to. Since I'm able to log into the client and I can get on the forms to look it up it's obviously NOT a problem on my end. Why am I being threatened with punishment?
i have the same problem, i would be kicked out of load screen everytime im 100% loaded, no matter how many times i try to reconnect. I dont have firewall, nor internet connection problems.

I actually never even got the loading screen, it was champ select aaaaand black screen. So far it hasn't happened again, so far so good. Unfortunately because this hasn't happened consistently for me I can't say it's #fixed until I get a decent number of games done without the same problem happening. I suggest following dArtagnan's directions in the other comment and hopefully that'll help. Good luck!
